mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, artnum, content, artdate, artphoto, mid, extension, (select count(*) from COMMENTS where titleseq like artnum) comcount, (select profilephoto from MEMBERS M WHERE M.MID LIKE ARTICLES.MID) profilephoto FROM ARTICLES, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE mid LIKE #{mid} ORDER BY artnum DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{pageSize}

SELECT artnum, content, artdate, artphoto, mid, extension, (select profilephoto from MEMBERS M WHERE M.MID LIKE ARTICLES.MID) profilephoto, (select name from MEMBERS M2 WHERE M2.MID LIKE ARTICLES.MID) mname FROM ARTICLES WHERE artnum LIKE #{artnum};

SELECT DISTINCT artnum, content, artdate, concat(artphoto,'.',extension) as artphoto, F.folloid as mname, (SELECT profilephoto FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID LIKE mname) profilephoto FROM ARTICLES A JOIN ( SELECT * FROM FOLLOWERS WHERE mid LIKE #{mid}) F ON A.mid LIKE F.folloid;

SELECT mid, profilephoto, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLES WHERE MID LIKE #{mid}) artcount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOWERS WHERE MID LIKE #{mid}) followerCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOWERS WHERE folloid LIKE #{mid}) folloingCount FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID LIKE #{mid}
